sentences.en: Calvin Wilson has been returned to a five - day workweek.
sentences.cn: 卡尔温-威尔逊已恢复每周工作5天.

sentences.en: Overtime hours and the length of the average workweek also have increased.
sentences.cn: 加班时数和平均每周工作时数也有增加.

sentences.en: Some companies are cutting back to a 4 - day workweek.
sentences.cn: 有些公司将工作制削减到了每周(工作)4天.

sentences.en: This is the third email from my boss this weekend. I'm a victim of workweek creep!
sentences.cn: 这是本周末我老板发给我的第三封邮件了. 我是 “ 公私不分”模式的受害者.

trans.tran_en: the total amount of time that you spend working during a week
